<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106045</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106045</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202736</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Area of Solids.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereich der Körper.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Zone des solides.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Área de sólidos.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Zona dei solidi.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περιοχή των στερεών.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Área de sólidos.</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Finding area of rectangular solids and cylinders by cutting them into flat pieces and adding the areas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereich der rechteckigen Körper und der Zylinder durch 
den Schnitt sie in flache Stücke finden und das Hinzufügen der 
Bereiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trouvant la zone des solides et des cylindres 
rectangulaires en les coupant dans les morceaux plats et en ajoutant 
les zones.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontrando a área de sólidos e de cilindros 
retangulares cortando os em partes lisas e adicionando as áreas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trovando zona dei solidi e dei cilindri rettangolari 
tagliandoli nelle parti piane ed aggiungendo le zone.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βρίσκοντας την περιοχή των ορθογώνιων στερεών και των 
κυλίνδρων με την κοπή τους στα επίπεδα κομμάτια και την προσθήκη 
των περιοχών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Encontrando el área de sólidos y de cilindros 
rectangulares cortándolos en pedazos planos y agregando las áreas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DOROTHY CARAWAN
FN:DOROTHY CARAWAN
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0

FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
